summary_teim:
Beginning of the 19th induction ceremony, honoring Prince, Traffic, Jann Wenner, and Jackson Browne. Features performances from Prince and Traffic.

[Camera angle: up stage, stage right.]

abstract_ssm:
This is a fourth camera angle of part 1 of the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony from March 15, 2004. It focuses primarily on the background musicians. It begins with footage of the crowd. Ahmet Ertegun and Seymour Stein give introductory remarks, followed by a video honoring important figures who had recently passed away. Prince performs "Let's Go Crazy," "Sign O' The Times," and "Kiss." Outkast introduces Prince, followed by a video montage and Alicia Keys inducting Prince. Prince gives an acceptance speech. A Traffic video montage is shown. Dave Matthews inducts Traffic, followed by Traffic's acceptance speech. Traffic then perform "Dear Mr. Fantasy." A video montage telling the history of Rolling Stone is shown. Ahmet Ertegun introduces Jann Wenner, who is then inducted by Mick Jagger. Wenner then gives an acceptance speech. A Jackson Browne video montage is shown. Bruce Springsteen then inducts Browne, who then gives an acceptance speech.

Ahmet Ertegun and Seymour Stein introductory remarks -- video montage honoring important figures who had recently passed -- Prince performs "Let's Go Crazy" -- Prince performs "Sign O' The Times" -- Prince performs "Kiss" -- Outkast introduces Prince -- Prince video montage -- Alicia Keys inducts Prince -- Prince acceptance speech -- Traffic video montage -- Dave Matthews inducts Traffic -- Traffic acceptance speech -- Traffic perform "Dear Mr. Fantasy" -- Rolling Stone video montage -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Jann Wenner -- Mick Jagger inducts Jann Wenner -- Jann Wenner acceptance speech -- Jackson Browne video montage -- Bruce Springsteen inducts Jackson Browne -- Jackson Browne acceptance speech
